title: Customer Stories | Numeral
description: Learn how Numeral helps leading ecommerce and SaaS businesses get compliant, stay compliant, and eliminate mistakes – we guarantee it.

data.html:
Beauty & Cosmetics

Inside Kitsch’s Switch to Numeral

Kitsch is a global beauty brand known for stylish, affordable, and sustainable hair and personal care products.

Toys, Games & Hobbies

4FRNT Consolidates U.S. and Canadian Sales Tax Compliance With Numeral

4FRNT is a skier-owned ski company known for designing innovative, high-performance gear tested on the mountain by passionate athletes.

Food & Beverage

immi Slashes 32 Pending Filings to Zero and Saves Dozens of Hours on Sales Tax Filings w/ Numeral

Founded by Kevin Chanthasiriphan and Kevin Lee in 2021, immi is on a mission to create flavorful, low-carb instant ramen, pushing the boundaries of classic noodles. Available nationwide, immi’s products have quickly become favorites among consumers.

Gifting

Nomad Goods Saved ~700 Hours of Work by Switching from TaxJar

Nomad Goods is a premium lifestyle brand known for its thoughtfully designed, high-quality accessories that seamlessly blend functionality and style. Specializing in tech-focused products, Nomad offers a diverse range of items, including rugged phone cases, sleek charging solutions, durable cables, and minimalist wallets.

Fashion & Apparel

Culprit Underwear: From Viral Marketing to Sales Tax Success with Numeral

Culprit Underwear, a brand built on bold creativity and even bolder marketing, didn’t think they’d ever scale to become a multi-million dollar brand.

Beauty & Cosmetics

Bro Glo: Scaling a Self-Tanning Empire while Numeral Takes Care of Sales Tax

As Bro Glo's sales soared, Tom and his team struggled with the complexities of sales tax compliance. They were collecting sales tax through Shopify but had yet to file or register in the states where they had nexus. That's where Numeral stepped in.

Health & Wellness

How BoomBoom Found Sales Tax Relief with Numeral

As BoomBoom expanded, the complexities of handling sales tax across numerous states began to affect John and his team. After trying out TaxJar and Avalara, they turned to Numeral's white-glove sales tax solution.

Health & Wellness

From Manual Tedium to Effortless Automation: How Numeral Transformed Rejuvia's Sales Tax Operations

Rejuvia's growth hit a snag when it started getting notified by states for sales tax owed. The team then spent dozens of hours filing sales tax until they realized it wasn't sustainable. That's when they discovered Numeral.

Show more posts

Sales tax on autopilot.

Spend fewer than five minutes a month on sales tax compliance with our white-glove service.

Get started
No credit card required.

How BoomBoom Found Sales Tax Relief with Numeral

As BoomBoom expanded, the complexities of handling sales tax across numerous states began to affect John and his team. After trying out TaxJar and Avalara, they turned to Numeral's white-glove sales tax solution.

Health & Wellness

From Manual Tedium to Effortless Automation: How Numeral Transformed Rejuvia's Sales Tax Operations

Rejuvia's growth hit a snag when it started getting notified by states for sales tax owed. The team then spent dozens of hours filing sales tax until they realized it wasn't sustainable. That's when they discovered Numeral.

data.html:
<style>

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 65%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  field-sizing: content;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:active {
  box-shadow: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit .actions {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit input {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill,
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:hover, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:focus, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:active {
  transition: background-color 5000s;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: var(--white) !important;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  display: none !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

	.v3_email-collect-form-embed {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
 .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  	border: none;
  	background: transparent;
	}
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
    flex-direction: column;
    grid-row-gap: 0.75rem;
    height: max-content;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field, .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
    width: 100%;
    height: 2.75rem;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
    max-width: 100%;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
    height: 2.75rem;
    width: 100%;
  }

}


</style>

<script>
  hbspt.forms.create({
    portalId: "39949294",
    formId: "7c6aefad-be41-466e-9cdb-38a4d3786439",
		onFormReady: function () {
      // Remove asterisk from placeholder:
      $('input[name="email"]').attr("placeholder", "Enter your work email");

			// April 1st changes:
			const pageSlug = document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('data-wf-item-slug');
      if(pageSlug == 'global') {
      	document.cookie = "enteringPage=global; path=/";
      }
    }
  });
</script>
